duck: Valid is a Brazilian engraving company headquartered in Rio de Janeiro that provides security printing services to financial institutions, telecommunication companies, state governments, and public agencies in Brazil, Argentina, and Spain.
valid definition: having legal efficacy or force; '''especially'''.

cat: Companies based in Rio de Janeiro
wiki.text:
{{Infobox company | name = Valid Soluções e Serviços de Segurança em Meios de Pagamento e | Identificação S.A. logo = type = Sociedade Anônima traded_as = foundation = | 1957 location = Rio de Janeiro, Brazil key_people = José Roberto Mauro (CEO) | area_served = industry = Engraving
Printing products = Smart cards, | Scratchcard, Driver's license and others market cap = revenue = | US$463.9 million (2012) operating_income = net_income = | US$56.1 million (2012) assets = equity = num_employees = | 5,000 homepage = [http://www.valid.com.br/ www.valid.com.br] footnotes = }} 'Valid' is a Brazilian engraving company headquartered in Rio de Janeiro that provides security printing services to financial institutions, telecommunication companies, state governments, and public agencies in Brazil, Argentina, and Spain. In total there are 7 factories and 84 personalization sites making the company in the leadership of the segments where it operates is registered in numbers. In 2010, sales totaled 465.1 million cards, 15.4 million driver's licenses and identity cards and 12.3 thousand tons of paper.
wiki.title: valid
